onset.Description: Time the object appeared on screen

duration.Description: Time the object remained on screen

Levels.central: Test cuing with a central node with central node options
Levels.boundary1: Test cuing with a boundary node with options that are 1-away in the graph
Levels.boundary2: Test cuing with a boundary node with options that are 2-away in the graph

environment.Description: Environment assigned to the cue object's community

community.Description: The community of the cue object

cue.Description: The node of the cue object

opt1.Description: The node of the option 1 object

opt2.Description: The node of the option 2 object

within_opt.Description: Option that is within the same community as the cue

response.Description: Response to the rotation detection task

response_time.Description: Time of response to rotation decision
